mutants.mutated_line: def generate_usernames(config, deity, region, number, min_len, prefix='MUTATED', suffix=''):
mutants.code:
def generate_usernames(config, deity, region, number, min_len, prefix='MUTATED', suffix=''):
    prospects = config.generator.get_prospects(input_words=[deity, region], number=number, min_len=min_len)
    usernames = [f'{prefix}{name}{suffix}' for name in prospects]
    return usernames
